description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(55).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,178,0,0,0,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 2, 5, 12, 173, 358, 889, 2136]; [n le 8 select I[n] else 178*Self(n-4)-Self(n-8): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 11 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
